attributes.action: Retain the present summer tome throughout winter and then put the clocks forward another hour next summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have decent weather in September for the past few yaers and i t is dark between 19.30 and 20.00, by giving us the extra hours will give us that extra time in the garden and for bbq's

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
